Package Controller

Class GameEngine

java.lang.Object
Controller.GameEngine
public class GameEngine extends Object
This is the entry point for the Game and keeps track of the current Game State.

    • executeMapEdit

      public void executeMapEdit(Command p_command) throws IOException, InvalidCommand
      Validation of the "editmap" command involves checking for the necessary arguments and directing control to the model for actual execution.

      p_command - command entered by the user on CLI
      Throws:
      IOException - indicates when failure in I/O operation
      InvalidCommand - indicates when command is invalid

      public void executeContinentEdit(Command p_command) throws IOException, InvalidCommand, InvalidMap

      Parameters:
      p_command - command entered by the user
      Throws:
      IOException - indicates failure in I/O operation
      InvalidCommand - indicates an invalid command
      InvalidMap - indicates an invalid map

    • executeMapSave

      public void executeMapSave(Command p_command) throws InvalidCommand, InvalidMap
      Validation of the "savemap" command involves verifying the presence of the necessary arguments and then redirecting control to the model for the actual processing.
      Parameters:
      p_command - command entered by the user.
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - indicates when map is invalid
      InvalidCommand - indicates when command is invalid

    • executeNeighbourEdit

      public void executeNeighbourEdit(Command p_entered_command) throws InvalidCommand, InvalidMap
      Validation of "editneighbor" command facilitates the functionality to check for necessary argument, not null checks and transfer control to model for further computation.
      Parameters:
      p_entered_command - command input entered by player
      Throws:
      InvalidCommand - throws exception if command is invalid
      InvalidMap - throws exception if map is invalid

      InvalidMap - throws exception if map is invalid

    • assignCountries

      public void assignCountries(Command p_command) throws InvalidCommand, IOException
      This method validates allocateCountries to ensure that the necessary arguments are in place and to transfer control to the model responsible for assigning countries to players.
      Parameters:
      p_command - user entered command
      Throws:
      InvalidCommand - exception for invalid commands
      IOException - for Input/Output operation failures
